opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 4th day of November, 2009, the Petition for Allowance of Appeal, treated as an Application for Relief per Pa.R.A.P. 123 is DENIED.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.
